name: MAREX Financial
overview: MAREX Financial Limited, a futures broker, provides services in the commodity and financial markets. Its e-services include EasyScreen, risk management, market access, support, and clearing services. The company covers commodity markets, including metals and plastics, energy, and agriculturals, as well as financial markets, including futures and options, foreign exchange, and equity derivatives. MAREX Financial Limited was formerly known as REFCO Overseas, Ltd. and changed its name to MAREX Financial Limited in 2006. MAREX Financial Limited is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom with additional offices in Geneva and Gibraltar.
